00002 /*
00003 COEN / ELEC 490, group 2009 - 04 Vertical Take Off and Land Autonomous Micro Aerial Vehicle
00004  
00005  The following code is the first step in developing the Low Level Controller.
00006  
00007  //really, this comment is still here? i wrote this 8months ago
00008  It uses timer2 to interrupt the arduino to control the motors. 
00009  Apparently, we're supposed to pulse it every 50ms and  I really 
00010  _REALLY_
00011  hate seeing delay(x) or sleep(x) in code.
00012  Talk about throwing CPU cycles into the garbage.
00013  So the CPU is spent mostly checking the sensors and Serial instead of waiting for the next motor pulse. 
00014  */
00015 
00016 #define HLCADDR 0x08
00017 #define LLCADDR 0x09
00018 
00019 #include <Wire.h>
00020 #include <Servo.h>

00035 //loop timers
00036 int loopStartTime = 0; 
00037 int loopEndTime = 0;
00038 int loopDeltaTime = 0;
00039 //end loop timers

00041 //THE STATE OF THE LLC
00042 int currentState = 0; // grounded
00043 int nextState = 0; // grounded

00057   // Create objects
00058   LowLevelController llc;
00059 
00060 void setup(){
00061   // initialize the interrupt timer 
00062   MsTimer2::set(MOTORPERIOD, setMotors); // 25ms period, call setMotors 25 ms
00063   MsTimer2::start();
00064 
00065   // Init serial
00066   Serial.begin(9600);   //Serial
00067   
00068   // Init ADC
00069   analogReference(EXTERNAL);     //using external analog ref of 3.3V for ADC scaling
00070   DDRC = B00000000;              // make all analog ports as inputs - just in case....
00071 
00072   //initialize I2C bus
00073   Wire.begin( LLCADDR);
00074   Wire.onReceive(receiveEvent);
00075   
00076 
00077 }
00078   int long eek = 5000;
00079   
00080 void loop(){
00081   //Serial.println(millis());
00082   loopEndTime = micros();
00083   loopDeltaTime = loopStartTime - loopEndTime; //should we push this into a stack?
00084   loopStartTime = micros(); 
00085   
00086   if (millis() > eek){
00087     
00088          sendTelemetryToHLC();
00089          eek = millis()+1000;
00090          Serial.println("sending telemetry");
00091   }
00092  
00093   if (currentState != nextState){
00094      sendTelemetryToHLC();
00095      currentState = nextState;
00096   } 
00097   
00098   //start motors
00099   if (llc.isWarmedUp() > 0){ //the motors need a warm up time of roughly 5000millis?
00100     llc.setAllQuiet();
00101     
00102   }
00103   
00104   readSerial(); 
00105 
00106  
00107 }
00108 
00109 void setMotors(){
00110   llc.updateMotors();
00111 }
